name: Covid Blaster '19
description:
Little asteroids clone lightly themed around fighting the covid-19 pandemic.

Armed with your trusty bottle of sanitizer break apart and eventually destroy as many viruses as you can! 

Controls

  • Aim with the mouse 
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to move 

Created by Vinny of the Dead.

Sanitizer and virus art by chew1y.
